languages.text: "Это, конечно, и так очевидно, но я все равно скажу это вслух! Все это скверно, скверно пахнет".
"I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."
languages.original_text: "Это, конечно, и так очевидно, но я все равно скажу это вслух! Все это скверно, скверно пахнет".

traits.locale_text: "I know I'm about to state the obvious, but I'll state it anyway! There's something very, very fishy about this."
"I know I'm about to state the obvious, but I'll state it anyway! There's something very, very fishy about this."
"I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."
"I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."
"I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."

languages.text: «Sé que lo que voy a decir es obvio, ¡pero lo diré de todos modos! Aquí pasa algo raro. Muy, muy raro».
languages.original_text: "I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."

traits.locale_text: «Sé que lo que voy a decir es obvio, ¡pero lo diré de todos modos! Aquí pasa algo raro. Muy, muy raro».

languages.text: “我知道我要说的事情显而易见，但我还是要说一下！这件事情不太对劲，有些东西非常不对劲。”
languages.original_text: "I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."

traits.locale_text: “我知道我要说的事情显而易见，但我还是要说一下！这件事情不太对劲，有些东西非常不对劲。”

languages.text: 「当たり前な発言かもしれませんが、念の為お伝えします！何かがおかしいです。おかしすぎます」
languages.original_text: "I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."

traits.locale_text: 「当たり前な発言かもしれませんが、念の為お伝えします！何かがおかしいです。おかしすぎます」

languages.text: "Ich weiß, ich spreche jetzt das Offensichtliche aus, aber ich mache es trotzdem! Hier stimmt etwas nicht. Überhaupt nicht."
languages.original_text: "I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, ich spreche jetzt das Offensichtliche aus, aber ich mache es trotzdem! Hier stimmt etwas nicht. Überhaupt nicht."

languages.text: « J'ai bien conscience que je m'apprête à énoncer une évidence, mais je dois le dire tout de même ! Quelque chose ne va pas. Cela ne présage absolument rien de bon. »
languages.original_text: "I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai bien conscience que je m'apprête à énoncer une évidence, mais je dois le dire tout de même ! Quelque chose ne va pas. Cela ne présage absolument rien de bon. »

languages.text: "Gün gibi ortada olsa da bir gerçeği dile getirmem gerek: Yanlış giden bir şeyler var. Hem de çok yanlış."
languages.original_text: "I know I am about to state the obvious, but I will state it anyway! There's something off about this. Something very off."

traits.locale_text: "Gün gibi ortada olsa da bir gerçeği dile getirmem gerek: Yanlış giden bir şeyler var. Hem de çok yanlış."
